contextId.information: "everyone will be so terrified that they will not be able to stand." This is an exaggeration. Another possible translation is, "every knee will flow with water," a euphemism for all the people losing control of their bladders because they are so frightened. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
contextId.quote: every knee will be weak as water

contextId.information: The word "all" here is a generalization. It means that many people will die. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
contextId.quote: will all fall by the sword
